summary: Synthya is a Breton Vampire*ish follower with some decent spells and combat abilities.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#980000][color=#ea9999][b][font=Verdana][u][size=6]Synthya[/size][/u][/font][/b][/color]

[/color]
[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4208/35712091311_b9322caf85_b.jpg[/img]

[color=#e06666][size=5]Thanks to all who downloaded and endorsed[/size][/color][color=#e06666][size=5]!!!

[/size][/color]


[color=#d9d2e9][size=5]Synthya is a Vampire*ish follower that can be found inside the Moorside Inn in Morthal. She will be unclothed when you first meet but she does have and outfit in her inventory that she should equip after you acquire her as a follower. She has all the stats of a Vampire character and has formidable combat skills with some added Dawnguard vampire abilities. She is set as essential and can be married. She is tagged as undead so you will have to use the Necromantic Healing or Heal Undead if you plan to heal her. I gave her a dual wield perk but not sure if she will use dual wielding in combat. If she does use [/size][/color][color=#d9d2e9][size=5][color=#d9d2e9][size=5]dual wielding please let me know.[/size][/color]Â  This is my attempt at making a vampire type character and I hope everyone will enjoy having her as a trusted companion on your journeys throughout Skyrim.

[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4280/35712085651_4283a31f4d_b.jpg[/img]
[/size][/color]


[size=6][b][color=#ea9999]Stats[/color][color=#ea9999]:[/color][/b][/size]

[color=#dd7e6b][size=4][color=#d5a6bd][size=5]Race: Breton

Class: EncClassVampire

Combat Class: VampireMelee1H

Body: UUNP HDT and CBBE HDT

Perks: Armsman, Bladesman,
Destruction Adept, Conjuration Adept,
Restoration, Illusion, and Lightfoot

Spells:Summon Gargoyle, Vampiric Drain,
and other basic spells

Weapon: Blade of Woe x2

Outfit: Vampire Clothes
and some enchanted jewelry

Level: With player from 5 to 250

Voice: Female Sultry

[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4218/35674960472_5406606b39_b.jpg[/img]




[b][color=#ea9999][size=6]Requirements[/size][/color][color=#ea9999][size=6]:[/size][/color][/b]
Dawnguard DLC
XPMSE Skeleton

[b][color=#ea9999][size=6]Installation[/size][/color][color=#ea9999][size=6]:[/size][/color][/b]
Nexus Mod Manager or Manual


[/size][/color][b][color=#ea9999][size=6]Recomended Mods:[/size][/color][/b]
[color=#d5a6bd][size=5]Facelight Plus
[/size][/color]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71063
[color=#d5a6bd][size=5]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/size][/color]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524
[color=#d5a6bd][size=5]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul[/size][/color]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568



[b][color=#ea9999][size=6]Credits:[/size][/color][/b]
[/size][/color]
[color=#dd7e6b][size=4][font=Verdana][color=#d5a6bd][size=3][size=4]UUNP HDT Bodyslide[/size][/size][/color][/font][font=Verdana][color=#d5a6bd]
[size=4]CBBE HDT Bodyslide[/size]
Mikan Eyes by nerune2525

KS Hairdo Renewal by Kalilies

Bethesda for Skyrim[/size][/color][/font]

[b][color=#ea9999][size=5]Feel free to post constructive comments and screenshots.
Also if anyone would like to make a video of her I will post it and give due credit for the making of it.
Thanks to the Nexus community for all the downloads and endorsements.

[color=#d5a6bd][size=6]Added a bunch of new images with Synthya wearing some great DX outfits.
If you download and like my girl please show her some love and give her an endorsement.
Thanks
[/size][/color]
[/size][/color][/b]

[/size][/color][/center]
author: lewbob
